title: Killers Amongst Us: Murder on the Waxworm Farm (part 4)
itunes:title: Killers Amongst Us: Murder on the Waxworm Farm (part 4)
description:
Police are now actively look to question Lois Riess. Riess' husband and now new friend Pamela Hutchinson are dead, and in the same manner. Has her modus operandi now been established? What happens next?

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
